definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely

sentences.english: Home use various methods to send letter also no echo.
sentences.chinese: 家裏用盡各種方式寄去的信也石沉大海。

sentences.english: That bellows, be like run out the energy that I finish a body.
sentences.chinese: 那一聲慘叫，像是用盡我畢身的力氣。

sentences.english: Brown tried all ways to get rid of Steelman, but he couldn't do it.
sentences.chinese: 布朗用盡一切辦法想趕走斯蒂爾曼，但都沒成功。

sentences.english: I pulled and pushed and tried everything, but it didn't move.
sentences.chinese: 我又拉又推用盡一切方法，但它卻紋絲不動。

sentences.english: She took a piece of bacon and ran out of the house.
sentences.chinese: 她採取了煙肉片斷並且用盡了房子。

sentences.english: And physicists are very parsimonious with postulates.
sentences.chinese: 而物理學家的原則是使用盡量少的假定。

sentences.english: She tried all imaginal ways to prevent a prosecution.
sentences.chinese: 她用盡一切想得到的辦法阻止她們控告。

sentences.english: And the water was spent in the bottle, and she cast the child under one of the shrubs.
sentences.chinese: 皮袋的水用盡了，夏甲就把孩子撇在小樹底下。

sentences.english: Farmer Lumpy proudly protects his giant ear of corn from a hungry crow!
sentences.chinese: 大傻鹿用盡所有心血去呵護他種出來的超級玉米。

sentences.english: I love thee with the passion put to use In my old griefs, and with my childhood's faith.
sentences.chinese: 愛你，我用盡所有舊時的悲傷，還有兒時純淨的信仰。

sentences.english: When the oil ran out, the flax smoked and they quenched it.
sentences.chinese: 油用盡了，麻冒煙，他們就吹滅。

sentences.english: What terms shall we find which have not been already exhausted?
sentences.chinese: 我們還能找到什麼尚未用盡的說辭呢？

sentences.english: Speak with Mrs. Atia Greenleaf and exhaust all conversation options.
sentences.chinese: 說話夫人阿蒂亞格林裏夫和用盡一切對話選項。

sentences.english: Insulated hand tools should be used when working on or around electrical equipment.
sentences.chinese: 操縱電器或在電器四周工作，應當使用盡緣的手工具。

sentences.english: I used up my eyesight to search and would like to see one's silhouette who set free the boat, yet I was disappointed.
sentences.chinese: 我用盡我的視力搜索，想從小舟上看見放舟人的身影。

sentences.english: The silk gland secretions completely exhausted, the moths pupate change.
sentences.chinese: 絲腺內的分泌物完全用盡，方化蛹變蛾。
